name: Sous Vide Cod
author: Bren
summary: Never eat another piece of overcooked cod again! This sous vide method produces cod that is flaky and moist and there's very little hands-on time.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Fill a large pot with water
Attach an immersion circulator to the pot
Set the temperature to 130 degrees F (54 degrees C) and the timer to 35 minutes
Season cod lightly with salt and pepper
Zest 1/2 of the lemon over each piece
Place butter and 2 lemon slices over the lemon zest
Place 1/2 of the shallot slices in the bottom of a resealable bag and place 1 cod loin on top
Repeat with second piece of cod and remaining shallot slices
Close the bags, leaving 1 small corner open
Lower the bags into the water and submerge until all the air has been expelled
Wait until timer goes off and remove the bags
Drizzle 1 tablespoon of cooking liquid from the bag over each cod loin
